summary: Adds foals to several locations around Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img=432x301]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48867-1-1387156808.png[/img]

[center][size=32][color=green]Foals[/color][/size][/center]

[center][size=14]Featuring new asymmetrical textures by Slof and remapped asymmetrical vanilla horse by Rebel O'conner![/center][/size]
Frost has been busy…

While Maven was busy plotting ways to swindle, intimidate or murder the good people of Skyrim, Frost was romancing their mares. Now the fruits of his labor are scattered across Skyrim.


[size=15][color=red]Use only one version[/color][/size]

Now in English and German

Foals of Skyrim – Adds vanilla, Gypsy Vanner, Arab, Friesian and Mustang type mares along with their foals. You'll find them at Windhelm Stables, Katla's Farm in Solitude, Snow-Shod Farm, Loreius Farm, Battle-Born Farm, Chillfurrow Farm, Darkwater Crossing, Sarthi Farm, Fellstar Farm, Rorikstead and Salvius Farm.



Foals of Skyrim Vanilla – Adds only Vanilla mares with their foals and there are fewer of them. You'll find them at Windhelm Stables, Katla's Farm in Solitude, Snow-Shod Farm, Loreius Farm, Battle-Born Farm, Chillfurrow Farm, Fellstar Farm and Salvius Farm.


[size=15][color=green]If you want to change your vanilla horses to these awesome new asymmetrical horses, check out Slof's website.[/color][/size]

Thanks to Slof for the beautiful new textures
Rebel O'conner for remapping the vanilla mesh
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the Creation Kit.
Thanks to the Blender, Paint.net, Nifscope and GIMP developers for providing free software.
Thanks to Hanaisse (Tes Alliance) for the 'Creating Armor in Skyrim' tutorial.
Thanks to Dark Rider (Tes Alliance) for the 'My First Stable' tutorial
Thanks to Ablaze666 for the German translations

Please note:
In light of the recent Steam pay walls, my permissions have changed.  

--You may not use any of my meshes in a mod you're charging for

--You may not alter my meshes without my permission    


The vanilla asymmetrical meshes, the textures and the colt's genitalia are from Slof.  You need to check Slof's Hive for permissions.
author: FieryMarigold

files.name: Foals of Skyrim
files.changelogHtml:
Added AI sandbox packages to the mares and foals on farms
Mares you can own now have a hold position package. Note foals will still follow them
Added 3 mares and foals you can own
Added some ownership papers

Mares you can own now have a hold position package. Note foals will still follow them
